Ukelele Army

Feb 25, 2020

Venue: Printers Playhouse, 44 Grove Road, Eastbourne

Come and join our PPH Ukulele Army. Meets weekly to play and sing. Bring your own uke or borrow one of ours! Tuition provided, don’t be shy!
